text: Cutis may refer to several unrelated biological structures: * Cutis (anatomy), the outermost layers of skin * Cutis (mycology), a type of pileipellis in a fungus ==Other== * Cutis (journal), an academic journal of dermatology published by Frontline Medical Communications * Cutiş, a village in Almașu Commune, Sălaj County, Romania
title: Cutis
